property.name: fs.emr.configuration.version
property.description: The version of this configuration file

property.name: fs.s3n.multipart.uploads.enabled
property.description: When enabled, large files will be uploaded to s3 using multipart uploads, must be enabled for files larger than 5GB

property.name: fs.s3.enableServerSideEncryption
property.description: When enabled, put object requests to s3 will be stored with encryption enabled

property.name: fs.s3.serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm
property.description: The algorithm supplied to s3 for server side encryption, default: AES256

property.name: fs.s3.consistent
property.description: Use dynamodb to provide S3 consistency

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.retryPolicyType
property.description: The policy, { exponential, fixed, none }, to use when retrying for consistency issues

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.retryPeriodSeconds
property.description: The length of time to wait between consistency retry attempts

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.retryCount
property.description: The maximum number of times to retry upon inconsistency

property.name: fs.s3.maxRetries
property.description: The number of times to retry an AWS SDK method on failure

property.name: fs.s3.sleepTimeSeconds
property.description: The length of time in seconds to wait between AWS SDK method failure retries

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.throwExceptionOnInconsistency
property.description: Throw or log ConsistencyException

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.metadata.autoCreate
property.description: Create metadata table automatically

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.metadata.tableName
property.description: Name of the metadata table in DynamoDB.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.metadata.read.capacity
property.description: The read capacity to provision on create.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.metadata.write.capacity
property.description: The write capacity to provision on create.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.fastList
property.description: When necessary, use multiple threads to list a directory. This option works only if consistency is turned on.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.fastList.prefetchMetadata
property.description: Enable metadata prefetching for directories containing more than 20K items.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.notification.CloudWatch
property.description: Track inconsistency with CloudWatch.

property.name: fs.s3.consistent.notification.SQS
property.description: Report inconsistency to SQS.

property.name: fs.s3.region.retryCount
property.description: Maximum retries that would be attempted to get AWS region.

property.name: fs.s3.region.retryPeriodSeconds
property.description: Base sleep time in second for each get-region retry.

property.name: fs.s3.region.fallback
property.description: Fallback to this region after maximum retries for getting AWS region have been reached.
